items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their workout activities with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can select a completed workout and share it to their social feed within the app
Shared activity displays workout type, duration, and distance
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities
non_functional: Activity sharing should complete within 2 seconds on a stable internet connection

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made include that the app already has workout tracking and user authentication features. Social feed module is assumed to be part of the scope.
